aka: At the End of the Film
awards:
第28届釜山国际电影节(2023)
　　亚洲之窗单元 金智奭奖(提名) Ahn Sunkyoung
trans_title: At the End of the Film
introduction: Film director Gong is getting ready to make a movie about a female mountaineer Cho-seon, who climbs Nanga Parbat, which has a sheer 4,500-meter foot wall. Like the main character who spend the night hanging from an ice wall, Gong’s project suddenly comes to a halt. Meanwhile, his cat Luca dies during an operation and he heads to a mountain to find his cat’s grave. During his journey, he meets a woman who came to find him. It turns out that she is Cho-seon, whom he tried to make a movie with but failed. Cho-seon who wants to be a movie character again struggle over Gong, and eventually falls down a cliff. Gong returns to reality, and moves on to his new scenario. One day, he goes to the service center where he met Cho-seon for the first time 6 years ago, and there he meets a woman.源自：https://siff.kr/en/films/%ec%9d%b4-%ec%98%81%ed%99%94%ec%9d%98-%eb%81%9d%ec%97%90%ec%84%9c/
